rows.name: Liar
rows.description: Falsehoods slip easily from your tongue. Gain a +10 bonus to Charm tests when employing the Blather Talent.

rows.name: Knavish
rows.description: People point to you as the very definition of 'roguish'. Take a -10 penalty to all Fellowship tests when interacting with nobles, priests or anyone else who might have reason to distrust you.

rows.name: Lithe
rows.description: Increase your Agility by 1d10, but reduce your Toughness by the same amount (which may reduce your Toughness Bonus). Also lose 2d10 pounds.

rows.name: Ranald's Mien
rows.description: You become leaner and more swarthy, and a mischievous smile always plays at your lips. Lose 2d10 pounds but gain 1d10 Fellowship.

rows.name: Cat Friend
rows.description: You attract cats everwhere. At least one shows up whenever you enter a community, and each day you remain (1d10/2)-1 more show up. They cannot fight for you byt you gain +20 to Charm Animal tests towards cats. When you leave a community the cats usually do not follow.

rows.name: Forgettable
rows.description: You're... that fellow. Or maybe a girl? You definitely had a head. Those who interact with you for several hours must pass a Challenging Intelligence test to recall anything other than your flashing eyes and roguish smile.

rows.name: Eagle Eyes
rows.description: You have the keen eyes of an eagle. Gain +20 bonus to Perception tests involving sight.

rows.name: Ranald's Luck
rows.description: Whenever you use a Fortune Point, roll 1d10. If you roll 8, 9 or 10 the Fortune Point works as normal but is not spent.

rows.name: Marked by Ranald
rows.description: A symbol of Ranald appears as a mark somewhere on your body (roll 1d100 for Hit Location). You gain +10 bonus to Pray tests when using Miracles of Ranald, and +10 bonus to Fellowship tests when dealing with other followers of Ranald if they can see the mark.
